description.en: Place six cups on your challenge field. Grab the cups one by one and stack them up in the middle of the field.

The cups have to be placed one by one in the middle.
Your robot has to stay within the challenge field.
Your robot mustn't knock down any of the cups.

You knocked down more than two cups = Good job! Are you ready for another round?
You only knocked down two cups = Wow! Excellent job! Do you think you can do it again with no cups kicked this time?
You haven't knocked down any of the cups = Outstanding! You are such a pro! Well done!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programing your robot?

Let's count your points!
You knocked down more than two cups = 5 points
You knocked down only two cups = 10 points
You haven't knocked down any of the cups = 15 points
We would love to see your results, please share it through our forum page by clicking on the following link:
